fields.name: welcome-email
fields.subject: Welcome to {{config.PROJECT_LONG_NAME}}
fields.content:
Dear {{ user.get_full_name }},

Welcome to {{ config.PROJECT_LONG_NAME }}. You can sign in at {{ config.DEPLOYMENT_URL }}.

Thanks,

The {{ config.PROJECT_SHORT_NAME }} team
fields.html_content:
{{ config.PROJECT_LONG_NAME }}

Dear {{ user.get_full_name }}, Welcome to {{ config.PROJECT_LONG_NAME }}. You can sign in here. Thanks, The {{ config.PROJECT_SHORT_NAME }} team
